quests.lastLine: I really enjoyed the movie, didn't you?
quests.sampleAnswer: Yes, the acting was incredible!

quests.lastLine: What do you think about the new restaurant?
quests.sampleAnswer: I think it has great food but the service is slow.

quests.lastLine: Are you coming to the party this weekend?
quests.sampleAnswer: Yes, I wouldn't miss it for the world!

quests.lastLine: I heard you got a new job. Congratulations!
quests.sampleAnswer: Thank you! I am really excited about this opportunity.

quests.lastLine: The weather has been terrible lately, hasn't it?
quests.sampleAnswer: It really has. I can't wait for summer to arrive.
quests.hint: Agree and add your own thought.

quests.lastLine: Have you been to the new shopping mall yet?
quests.sampleAnswer: Not yet, but I plan to visit this weekend.

quests.lastLine: I can't believe how expensive everything is now.
quests.sampleAnswer: I know, prices have gone up quite a lot recently.

quests.lastLine: Do you have any hobbies?
quests.sampleAnswer: Yes, I enjoy reading and playing the guitar.

quests.lastLine: How was your vacation?
quests.sampleAnswer: It was wonderful! We visited some beautiful places.

quests.lastLine: Would you like to grab some coffee?
quests.sampleAnswer: That sounds great! I know a nice place nearby.
